title: Performance Issues
description: Users experiencing slow loading times and performance bottlenecks, particularly with large datasets and dashboard functionality.
example_quotes: The dashboard loads too slowly when we have large datasets
Bulk actions would save us so much time
Need better filtering options in the analytics section

title: Mobile App Stability
description: Critical issues with mobile app crashes and missing features that block field team productivity.
example_quotes: Mobile app crashes when uploading files larger than 10MB
The mobile app UI is intuitive but could use better offline capabilities

title: Positive User Experience
description: Users praising new features, search functionality, and overall product experience with high satisfaction.
example_quotes: Love the new search feature! It finds exactly what I need in seconds
Fantastic customer support! The team responded within 2 hours
The new onboarding flow is much clearer

title: Integration & API Needs
description: Requests for better integrations, API improvements, and enterprise-level connectivity features.
example_quotes: API documentation is confusing and lacks examples
Integration with Salesforce would be huge for us

title: Security & Compliance
description: Critical security concerns and compliance requirements that need immediate attention for enterprise clients.
example_quotes: Security audit found some issues with data encryption

title: Feature Enhancement Requests
description: Users requesting UI improvements and new features like dark mode, Excel export, and better customization options.
example_quotes: Need Excel export functionality for our reports
